text.私、スペシャルウィークって言います！\\n夢は日本一のウマ娘です！お母ちゃんたち:
My name is Special Week! My dream 
is to be the best horse girl in 
Japan! I'm gonna pull my own weight 
in order to make my moms proud!
text.サイレンススズカです。走るのが好きです。\\n先頭は、誰にも譲りません。\\nえ: I'm Silence Suzuka. I like to run. \nI'm not giving the lead to anyone. \nUm… That's all.
text.やっほー、トウカイテイオーだよ！\\n無敗の三冠ウマ娘になるボクのこと、\\nぜ:
Heya, I'm Tokai Teio! I'm going 
to be an undefeated Triple Crown 
horse girl, so don't let me 
out of your sight!
text.ハァーイ、マルゼンスキーよ！\\n君も見にきたんでしょ？異次元の走り。\\nふふ:
Hi, I'm Maruzensky! Did you come to 
see this new style of running too? 
Hehe ♪ Even though I'm crazy about 
it… I don't know how to feel ♪
text.みんなを楽しませる漆黒のエンターテイナー\\nフジキセキだよ！最高の“キセキ”で: I'm the jet-black entertainer, Fuji \nKiseki! I'll make you smile with my \nbest "miracle"!
text.私はオグリキャップ。\\n故郷のみんなに喜んでもらえるよう、\\n精一杯頑張るつ:
I am Oguri Cap. I'm going 
to do my best to make everyone 
in my hometown happy. Please 
take care of me.
text.よう、ゴールドシップ様だ！たとえ\\n火の中、芝の中！宇宙の果てでも関係ねえ！\:
Yo, I'm Gold Ship! I don't care 
if its on the turf, on fire, or 
at the edge of the universe, I'm 
going to find something interesting 
wherever I can! ☆
text.おっす、ウオッカだ！俺のポリシーは、\\n誰よりもカッケーウマ娘でいること！\\:
Yo, I'm Vodka! My goal is to be the 
coolest horse girl in the world! 
I'm not gonna do anything stupid. 
Remember that!
text.こんにちは、ダイワスカーレットです！\\n精一杯頑張り…って、アンタか。ふんっ！: Hello, I'm Daiwa Scarlet! I'll do \nmy best to… Hmph! I'm going to be \nnumber one. That's all!
text.ハウディ！タイキシャトルです！\\nワタシのパワフルな走りでみんなを\\nハッピ: Howdy! I'm Taiki Shuttle! I'm here \nto make everyone happy with my \npowerful running!
text.グラスワンダーと申します。\\nウマ娘として生まれたからには、その“道”\\nを: My name is Grass Wonder. Since I \nwas born as a horse girl, I want to \npursue this path to the end. Hehe ♪
text.いいツラ構えの奴が大勢いるねえ…\\nへへっ、全員このヒシアマ姐さんが\\n相手:
There are a lot of good lookin' 
people here… hehe. I'll take them 
all on, I'm Hishiama! Come on, 
let's get to it!
text.メジロマックイーンと申します。我が生家、\\nメジロ家の悲願である『天皇賞』の制:
My name is Mejiro McQueen. 
Conquering the "Spring Tennosho" 
has been a long-cherished goal of 
the Mejiro family, and I will do it 
with my own two legs.
text.コースを駆ける真紅の怪鳥！\\nエルコンドルパサー参・上・デース！\\n世界を目: I'm the crimson bird that runs the \ncourse! El Condor Pasa is closing \nin! I'm flying around the world!
text.はーっはっはっは！ボクこそが最も強く\\n美しい“覇王”テイエムオペラオーさ！\:
Haa-ha-ha-ha! I am the strongest 
and most beautiful of them all, the 
"Supreme King", T.M. Opera O! Now, 
let the legend begin!
text.…ナリタブライアンだ。\\nわざわざ語って聞かせるような話はない。\\nただ走り: …I'm Narita Brian. I don't have a \nstory to tell you. I just run, \ncrush, and win.
text.私はシンボリルドルフ。あらゆるウマ娘の\\n頂点に立ち導く“皇帝”たらんとする者:
I am Symboli Rudolf. I am the one 
who will stand at the top of every 
horse girl and lead them to become 
"Emperors". Those of you who share 
my aspirations, let's work together 
to conquer the world!
text.エアグルーヴだ。信念を曲げなければ\\n理想は必ず芽吹く。それを示すため\\n私:
I am Air Groove. If you don't 
bend your beliefs, your ideals 
will surely sprout. In order 
to demonstrate this, I, the 
Empress, will be the guiding 
light for everyone.
text.お疲れちゃん！デジたんですっ！\\nキラキラのウマ娘ちゃんたちを推してます！\\:
Hewwo! I'm Digi-tan! I'm a massive 
fan of all of the sparkling horse 
girls! I'm so happy every day! I'm 
so glad I was born an otaku!～♪
text.やっほー、セイウンスカイだよー。\\n適度にテキトーにのーんびりしてこー。\\n:
Yahoo-, it's Seiun Sky. Take your 
time and relax. …When you're aiming 
for a big goal, it's important to 
take your time, right?
text.タマモクロスや！ウチはな、レースで勝って\\n勝って勝ちまくって名前を売るんや！:
Ah'm Tamamo Cross! A'hm gonna win'n 
win'n win to make a name for 
myself! Don't underestimate me just 
'cause ah'm small!
text.ご機嫌よう、ファインモーションです！私、\\n素敵な思い出をたくさん作りたいの。:
Good day, I'm Fine Motion! I want 
to make lots of great memories. 
First things first, I want to know 
where the best noodle shops are. ♪
text.ビワハヤヒデだ。私の目的は、完全なる\\n勝利の方程式を組み立てること。…あと、:
I'm Biwa Hayahide. My goal is to 
assemble the perfect winning 
formula. …Also, I have a normal 
sized head!
text.えへへ、マヤちんだよーっ☆\\nワクワクすることとか～、シゲキの\\nあることが: Ehehe, I'm Mayachin!☆ I love \nthrilling and exciting things～ Nice \nto meet'cha!
text.…マンハッタンカフェ、です。\\n私には…追いつきたい友だちがいます…。\\nい:
…I am Manhattan Cafe. I have a 
friend I want to catch up to… The 
girl who always runs in front of 
me… She's right there…
text.私の名はミホノブルボン。\\n目標は三冠ウマ娘に設定されています。\\n脚質など:
My name is Mihono Bourbon. My goal 
is locked onto becoming a Triple 
Crown horse girl. Please refer to 
my data for legwork and other 
information.
text.メジロライアンって言います！\\n体を鍛えて元気よく！筋肉育てて\\n健やかに！: My name is Mejiro Ryan! Train your \nbody, stay healthy! Grow some \nmuscle, stay fit! Let's go for it!
text.ボノボーノ♪ヒシアケボノだよ～☆\\n料理も走りも、大っっきな愛情込めて\\nみ:
I'm Hishi Akebono ♪, I'll put 
lo～ts of love into both cooking 
and running for everybody! It's 
nice to meet you!～
text.あ、あたしはユキノビジン言います！\\nチンクルシリーズでイケてるシチーガールに:
Oh, my name is Yukino Bijin! My 
dream is to become a stylish city 
gal in the Twankle Series! Phew… I 
hope I said that right…
text.ライスシャワー…です。あ、あのね…？\\nライス、みんなを不幸にする…だめな子な: I'm… Rice Shower. Um… I'm a useless \ngirl who makes others unhappy… but \nI'm trying my best to change!
text.はろはろ～！アイネスフウジンなの！\\n家族みーんなに喜んでもらえるように、\\: Hey hey～! I'm Ines Fujin! I'm going \nto race and work hard to make sure \nmy family is happy!～
text.君も興味ないかい。ウマ娘がどこまで\\n速くなれるのか。もしあるのなら…この私、:
Aren't you interested about how 
fast a horse girl can go? If you 
are, I, Agnes Tachyon, would like 
you to be my guinea pig.
text.アドマイヤベガよ。……もう行っていい？\\nもっとトレーニングして、レースに勝っ:
Admire Vega. …Can I go now? 
I need to train more, win more 
races, and I need to become 
a first magnitude star.
text.てやんでい！あたしはイナリワンってんだ！\\n見ての通りチャキチャキの江戸っ子で:
The hell are ya sayin'?! I'm 
Inari One! As you can see, I'm 
an efficient child of Edo! I 
wanna become the biggest horse 
girl of them all!
text.アタシ、アタシ！ダービーウマ娘になるのが\\n夢なんだ！あとは…あーっ！！名前！:
My… My… My dream is to be a Derby 
horse girl! And then there's… ah! 
My name!!!! My name is Winning 
Ticket! Nice to meet you!
text.エアシャカールだ。どんな勝負でもデータが\\nものをいう。シミュレーションに問題:
I'm Air Shakur. In any case, data 
speaks louder than victory or 
defeat. I don't have a problem with 
simulation, I'll screw you over, 
logistically.
text.エイシンフラッシュと申します。\\nウマ娘の伝統を守る為、私は走り続けます。\\:
My name is Eishin Flash. In order 
to keep the tradition of horse 
girls alive, I will continue to 
run. Every race and everything else 
is on schedule.
text.Currenこと、カレンチャンでーす！\\n世界を“カワイイ”で包んじゃいます☆:
I'm Curren, a.k.a. Curren Chan! I'm 
going to wrap the world in 
"cuteness"!☆ Don't look away, just 
look at Curren ♪
text.おーっほっほ！私はカワカミプリンセス…\\nそう、気品高き姫の中の姫！レースでも:
Oh-ho-ho! I am Kawakami Princess… 
yes, a princess above all 
princesses! I'll daintily knock you 
off of your feet at the races!
text.ゴールドシチー。…言っとくけど、アタシの\\nことお人形扱いしたら許さないから。:
Gold city. …Just letting you know, 
I won't forgive you if you treat 
me like a doll. I don't want you 
to judge me by my looks, but by 
the way I run.
text.こんにちはッ！サクラバクシンオーです！\\nご覧の通り、優秀な委員長でもあります:
Hello! My name is Sakura Bakushin 
O! As you can see, I am a brilliant 
class representative! Let's set a 
great example for everyone! 
BAKUSHIIIN!
text.ほーっほっほっほ！シーキングザパールよ！\\n知ってる？世界は可能性に満ちている:
Haa-ha-ha-ha! It's Seeking the 
Pearl! Guess what? The world is 
full of possibilities, and I'm 
gonna prove it to you!
text.ガオ～ッ！シンコウウインディなのだ！\\nビビったか？正直に怖いって言えなのだ～:
Roar～! It's Shinko Windy! 
You scared? You can tell me 
if you're scared～! …Hey! Don't 
ignore me! Grrrrr!
text.スイープトウショウは変身前の名前！\\nアタシは魔法少女スイーピーなの！\\nこ:
Sweep Tosho is my 
pre-transformation name! I am 
Sweepy the Magical Girl! Now this 
is sorcery! Aaah!! (Bonk)
text.うふふっ、スーパークリークですよ～。\\nみんなの笑顔のためなら、う～んと\\n: Tee-hee… it's Super Creek!～ I'll do \nmy best to make everyone smile. \nPlease leave it to me ♪
text.スマートファルコンでーっす！ファル子って\\n呼んでね！私、ウマドルになるのが夢:
I'm Smart Falcon! You can 
call me Falco! My dream is 
to become a Umadol! Autographs 
are always welcome ☆
text.ゼンノロブロイと申します。その…こんな私\\nですが、英雄譚に憧れていまして…い:
My name is Zenno Rob Roy. Well… 
this is me… but I'm longing for a 
heroic tale… I want to create my 
story within a race someday…!
text.あたしはトーセンジョーダン。夢は……\\nって感じの、固い話NGだからよろ～☆\:
I'm Tosen Jordan. My dream is… 
actually, serious topics are 
NG～☆ Anyways, look at my nails! 
Aren't they cool?
text.ナカヤマフェスタだ。\\n生ぬるいレースじゃ、スリルを感じねぇ。\\nなァ…もっ:
It's Nakayama Festa. Halfhearted 
races don't give me a thrill. 
Hey… Let me feel the intense 
heat of the race…!
text.ナリタタイシン。以上。アタシはただ\\n勝ちまくって、バカにしたヤツらに\\nわ:
Narita Taishin. That's all. I just 
want to win and shove it in the 
faces of the ones who made fun of 
me… Leave me alone.
text.こんにちは、ニシノフラワーです。\\nみなさんに頼ってもらえるくらい、素敵な\\:
Hello, my name is Nishino Flower. I 
want to become a nice, sisterly 
horse girl so that everyone can 
rely on me…!
text.わたし、ハルウララ！にんじんとね、\\nあとは、たのしいから走るのがだ～い好き♪:
I'm Haru Urara! I love carrots and 
I lo～ve running because it's fun!♪ 
I'm going to try my very best to 
finish first!
text.ちわっス！バンブーメモリーっス！\\n鬼の風紀委員長の名にかけて\\nビシバシ走:
Hey there! Bamboo Memory! I'm going 
to run hard to earn the name of 
"Demon Chairman of the Public 
Discipline Committee"!
text.正義のヒーロー、ビコーペガサス参上！\\nアタシの走りはどんな強敵もバーンと倒し:
The hero of justice, Biko Pegasus, 
is here! I can take down any 
formidable foe and make everyone 
smile! Isn't that great!
text.ハイハーイ、マーベラスサンデーでーす！\\n全世界に、マーベラスな気持ちを届ける:
Hi hi～, I'm Marvelous Sunday! I'm 
bringing a Marvelous feeling to the 
whole world! Now, let's all be 
Marvelous together!
text.どうも！マチカネフクキタルって言います！\\nシラオキ様のお告げを信じて、福を掴:
Hello! They call me 
Matikanefukukitaru! I believe in 
the divine messages of 
Shiraoki-sama, and I constantly am 
working on my fortune telling, 
waiting for the day I'll be blessed 
with good fortune!
text.メ、メイショウドトウです…！あの、あの、\\n私、自分に自信が持てるようになりた: I-I'm Me-Meisho Doto! U-uhm, uhm… \nI've been trying my best to become \nmore confident in… m-mythelf — OWW!
text.どうも…えっと、メジロドーベルです。\\nアタシもメジロ家のウマ娘だし、それに\:
Hello… I'm Mejiro Dober. I'm a 
horse girl of the Mejiro family, 
and I'm not ashamed to say that… I 
intend to do my best.
text.あー…ナイスネイチャでーす。あはは、\\nやっぱ『素晴らしい素質』なんて名前負け:
Uh… I'm Nice Nature. I guess I 
don't really live up to the name of 
"Nice Nature", haha… Let's take it 
easy, shall we?
text.おーっほっほ！私の名前はキングヘイロー。\\n一流のウマ娘として最高の結果を残す:
Ohhh-ho-ho! My name is King Halo. 
As a first-class horse girl, I'll 
give you the best results… And show 
the world this talent of mine!
text.やっほー、マチカネタンホイザだよ。\\nみんなに負けないよう、張り切って\\n練:
Yoo-hoo, I'm Matikanetannhauser. 
I've been practicing hard so I 
won't lose to anyon — Oh, today's 
my day off?!
text.イクノディクタスと申します。\\nマネジメントならお任せください。\\n鉄の意志:
My name is Ikuno Dictus. If you are 
looking for management, leave it to 
me. I will manage you thoroughly 
with an iron will.
text.メジロパーマーだよ！元気してる～？\\nま、なんかあったらいつでも聞くからさ。\:
I'm Mejiro Palmer! How ya doing～? 
Well, if you ever need anything, 
I'm always here. Feel free to 
talk to me ♪
text.ウェーーイ！ダイタクヘリオスでぇーっす！\\nテンアゲなレースブチかましてくんで: Weee～iii! I'm Daitaku Helios～! I'm \ngonna run the most hype race ever, \nso please give me your best call! ☆
text.ツインターボだー！\\nターボ1番とるもん、ぜったいとるもんっ！\\nいっくぞー: Twin Turbo! I'll take the first \nTurbo, I'll take it for sure! Let's \ngo, Turbo, full throttle!!!
text.サトノダイヤモンドと申します。\\n最初から決まった運命なんてありません。\\n:
My name is Satono Diamond. My fate 
has never been decided from the 
beginning. I will make the future 
shine with my running!
text.あたしはキタサンブラック！\\nお祭りみたいにみんなが盛り上がる\\n最高のレー: I'm Kitasan Black! I'm going to run \nas fast as I can to make this race \nas exciting as a festival!
text.サ、サクラチヨノオーです！\\n憧れのあの人と、夢の舞台に立つために\\nこの想:
I'm S-Sakura Chiyono O! I will 
make my dream of standing on 
my ideal stage with the person 
of my dreams blossom!
text.シリウスシンボリだ！\\nレースに御託はいらねぇ。黙って見てな。\\n世界を獲っ:
Sirius Symboli! No need to talk 
about the race. Just shut up 
and watch. I'm going to conquer 
the world and prove that I'm 
the strongest.
text.メジロアルダンと申します。\\nこの脚は儚くとも、誇り高く走りたい…\\n一瞬で:
My name is Mejiro Ardan. I want 
to run proudly, even if these 
legs will be short-lived… Even 
if only for a moment, I would 
like to shine in a race.
text.ヤエノムテキです。金剛八重垣流の\\n門弟として、強者とのレースを所望します。\:
I'm Yaeno Muteki. As a disciple of 
the Kongo Yaegaki way, I desire to 
race with the strong. Come on, 
let's fight like crazy!!
text.ツルマルツヨシ！憧れの『三冠ウマ娘』\\n目指して！とにかく全力をっ――…ゲホッ:
Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi! Aiming to 
become the "Triple Crown Horse 
Girl" of my dreams! I'll give it my 
all… BLEH! I-I just swallowed a lot 
of blood! I'm fine, I'm alright!
text.…………まあ？ 自己紹介の時間ですの？\\nうふふっ、メジロブライトと申します。:
………Hmm? Is it time for me to 
introduce myself? Heheheh, 
my name is Mejiro Bright. I 
will try my best as a member 
of the Mejiro family～.
text.サクラローレルです。目指すのは、世界。\\n凱旋門賞です！――ふふ、今はただの『:
I'm Sakura Laurel. My goal is the 
world. The Prix de l'Arc de 
Triomphe! ―Well, it's just a 
"dream" now, but… I'll make it come 
true someday for sure!
text.こんにちは、ナリタトップロードです！\\n応援してくださるみなさんの期待に\\n:
Hello, I'm Narita Top Road! I will 
do my best to live up to the 
expectations of all of the ones who 
support me!
text.……ヤマニンゼファーです。\\n私が目指すのは、風…なによりも速く、\\n自由に:
……My name is Yamanin Zephyr. My 
goal is to be the wind… I want to 
be like the wind that runs faster 
and freer than anything else!
text.――シンボリクリスエスだ。シンボリ家には\\n恩がある。その1人として、掲げた目:
―I'm Symboli Kris S. I am indebted 
to the Symboli family. As one of 
them, I will carry out both the 
objectives I have set, and the 
"mission" I have been assigned.
text.俺はタニノギムレット！求めるのは理想の\\n“ワタシ”。仮棲まいの己を騙る気はな:
I am Tanino Gimlet! What I seek is 
the ideal "me". I have no intention 
of deceiving my temporary self. 
Destroy it, kick it down, and 
progress to the end!
text.ダイイチルビーと申します。\\n至上であることこそ、我が一族の務め。\\n己の責: My name is Daiichi Ruby. To be \nsupreme is the duty of my family. I \nwill strive to fulfill my duty.
text.マーちゃんです。アストンマーチャン。\\nいずれ世界のマスコットになります。\\:
I'm Machan. Aston Machan. I will 
eventually become the world's 
mascot. Keep looking straight at me 
with those eyes.
text.リッキー☆ラッキー☆大吉祥☆\\nコパノリッキーだよっ！風水の力で\\nキミにも: Rickey ☆ Lucky ☆ Auspicious ☆ \nCopano Rickey! The power of Feng \nShui will bring you happiness too ♪
text.ワンダーアキュートじゃ。\\nのんびりしとるが、コツコツやるのは\\n得意なんよ: I'm Wonder Acute. I'm a slow \nlearner, but I'm a hard worker. \nPlease take care of me.
text.私、ライトハローはイベント企画を主な業務\\nとしております。ステージで輝くみな:
I, Light Hello, am mainly in 
the business of event planning. 
I will help all of you shine 
on stage… Please allow me to 
help you out a bit.
